attributes.action: Parliament now needs to accept leaving the EU as reflected in the MEP election
attributes.additional_details: Parliament cannot keep ignoring the majority of the electorate. It is time to accept the result and move on. No more talk of second vote, no longer accepting no deal is not an option. They have to accept this in order to move forward and get the Great put back in Great Britain.
attributes.background: The message from the electorate again states they want to leave the EU now even without a deal. The Brexit Party crossed the finish line with most votes. This has to be accepted and not interpreted to meet other parties wishes.
